mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REALESTATE_AGENT WHERE MEMBER_NO IS NOT NULL
SELECT RA.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.EMAIL, RA.AGENT_NO, RA.AGENT_NAME, RA.AGENT_PHONE, RA.ATTACHMENT, RA.APPLY_STATUS FROM REALESTATE_AGENT RA JOIN MEMBER M on RA.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REALESTATE_AGENT(AGENT_NO, STATE, BJDONG_NM, ADDRESS, REF_NAME, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_PHONE, MEMBER_NO, ATTACHMENT) VALUES(#{agentNo},#{state},#{bjdongNm},#{address},#{refName},#{agentName},#{agentPhone},#{memberNo},#{attachment})
